Package org.scilab.modules.console

Class Summary
ClearConsoleAction Class used to clear console
CompletionAction Class used when Scilab user asks for completion on the current edited line
ConsoleboxAction Class used to open console box on windows
ConsoleConfiguration  
ConsoleConfiguration.Conf  
ConsoleOptions Console options
ConsoleOptions.ConsoleColor  
ConsoleOptions.ConsoleDisplay  
ConsoleOptions.ConsoleFont  
DelEndOfLineAction Delete the line from the caret postion to the end of the line when an event occurs This event is configured in configuration.xml file
DelLastWordAction Delete last word and trailing spaces of the line when an event occurs This event is configured in configuration.xml file
DelNextCharAction Delete character following the caret when an event occurs (equivalent of a SUPPR key press) This event is configured in configuration.xml file
DelPreviousCharAction Delete character preceeding the caret when an event occurs (equivalent of a BACKSPACE key press) This event is configured in configuration.xml file
DelWholeLineAction Delete the entire line when an event occurs This event is configured in configuration.xml file
DropFiles  
DropFilesJNI  
FocusMouseListener NO MORE USED BECAUSE NOW THE CARET OF THE OUTPUT VIEW IS USED TO DO THIS WORK Mouse listener for the output view Automatically forward the focus to input view
GetNextAction  
GetPreviousAction  
GuiManagement All Scilab gui management used in Java console
GuiManagementJNI All Scilab gui management used in Java console
HelpAction Class used to launch help browser
InterruptScilabWorkOrCopy Stops Scilab current work to enter pause mode Or copy selected text (if there is) This event is configured in configuration.xml file
InterruptScilabWorkOrCut Stops Scilab current work to enter pause mode Or cut selected text (if there is) This event is configured in configuration.xml file
LineBeginningAction Delete the beginning of the line up to caret position when an event occurs This event is configured in configuration.xml file
LineEndAction Go to the end of the line when an event occurs This event is configured in configuration.xml file
NextCharAction Moves the caret of character to the left when an event occurs This event is configured in configuration.xml file
OneCharKeyEventListener This key listener is used to wait for one input char when displayed data are bigger than console
PageDownAction Scroll down the console This event is configured in configuration.xml file
PageUpAction Scroll up the console This event is configured in configuration.xml file
PasteClipboard Paste the contents of the clipboard in Scilab Console Each line is executed by Scilab before a new one can be pasted This event is configured in configuration.xml file
PreviousCharAction Moves the caret of character to the right when an event occurs This event is configured in configuration.xml file
SciCommandLineView Scilab Console UI where the user enters a new command to execute including the prompt
SciCompletionManager Class used completion management in Scilab Java Console
SciCompletionWindow Scilab completion window main class
SciConsole Main class for Scilab Console based on Generic Console from Artenum
SciDropTargetListener DropTragetListener specific for Scilab console
SciHistoryManager Manage all history actions if not implemented in Scilab core
SciInputCommandView Scilab UI that contains the line edited by the user
SciInputParsingManager  
SciInterpreter Scilab interpreter associated to the Scilab console
SciOutputView Scilab Console UI which contains the previous commands and their outputs
SciPromptView Scilab Console UI which contains the prompt
SelectAllAction Class used to select all in console
ValidationAction Class used to call Scilab interpreter
